string-array.name: nationsandnationalitiesnew_title
string-array.item: Kiitollinen kansakunta odottaa sinua. \n\n Meaning: A grateful nation is waiting to say thank you.
Norja on Suomen rajanaapuri.\n\n Meaning:Norway is Finland\'s border neighbor.
Bangladesh oli aiemmin Itä-Pakistan.\n\n Meaning:Bangladesh was formerly East Pakistan.
Kiinan kansantasavalta on maa Itä-Aasiassa.\n\n Meaning:The People\'s Republic of China is a country in East Asia.
Ranskan pääkaupunki on Pariisi.\n\n Meaning:The capital of France is Paris.
Saksa on Länsi-Euroopan maa \n\n Meaning:Germany is a Western European country
Kreikan pääkaupunki on Ateena. \n\n Meaning:The Greek capital is Athens.
Intian rajanaapuri on Pakistan. \n\n Meaning:India\'s border is Pakistan.
Pakistan rajanaapuri on Intia.\n\n Meaning:Pakistan\'s border is India.
Venäjän pääkaupunki on Moskova.\n\n Meaning:The Russian capital is Moscow.
Madrid on Espanjan pääkaupunki.\n\n Meaning:Madrid is the capital of Spain.
Puhutteko ruotsia?\n\n Meaning:Do you speak Swedish?
Britannia tarvitsee vahvan johtajan.\n\n Meaning:Britain needs a strong leader.
Määränpää, kansallisuus ja koko nimi,\n\n Meaning:Your destination, your nationality and your full name.
